summary: While in Thailand to avenge his brother who was crippled in a fight with a corrupt Thai boxer, a man gets caught up in a web of fate, Buddhism and black magic.
cast: Phillip Ko|Shao-Yen Lin|Kar-Man Wai|Lung Wei Wang|Somjai Boomsong|Tien-Chu Chin|You-Hsing Lai|Wai Lam|Hak-Shun Leung|Chih Tai Lin|Chun Liu|Han-Yuan Ma|Edmund P. Meneses|Major Oponpa|Victor B. Pumicpic|Gwa-Pau Sai|Rolando San-Juan|Elvis Tsui|Bolo Yeung|Hsiang Lin Yin
title: Mo
